CREATE PROCEDURE dsh_GetGroupItems @Group NVARCHAR(100) AS
BEGIN IF @Group = 'Contact_name' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT ec.id_contact AS id, ec.name AS name FROM ent_Contacts ec WHERE ec.isReport = 1 AND ec.isActiv = 1 END ELSE IF @Group = 'Good_name' BEGIN SELECT eg.id_good AS id, eg.name AS name FROM ent_Goods eg WHERE eg.isDeleted = 0 END END;
